title: Media sound suddenly stopped working for no reason
content: Alarms and call sounds work but videos on facebook, instagram, spotify, notifications etc doesn't work. It hasn't been dropped it water or anything. I have tried restarting, cleaning the headphone jack and clearing the cache, and some other things I've seen suggested nothing seems to be working. I was just watching a video on fb and the phone was on the table and then it stopped so I don't understand why
